0.text: Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks and damaging abilities apply a Resonance stack to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.

1.text: At 3 stacks, Resonance is consumed to deal 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage, increased by 150% against  monsters, dealing 75 − 350 (based on level) (+ 200% AP).

2.text: Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

3.text: Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a  champion grants Ekko 50 / 60 / 70 / 80% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 / 2.5 / 3 (based on level) seconds.

0.text: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.

1.text: After traveling 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds, expanding and creating a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, while continuing to travel in its direction for another 190 units and expanding for another 50 units.

2.text: After finishing its path, the grenade contracts and returns to Ekko at a higher speed, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.

3.text: The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.

0.text: Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage to targets below  30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against  minions and  monsters.

1.text: Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting  sight of the area for 2.5 seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device expands to  slow enemies within the area by 40%.

2.text: If Ekko enters the expansion within the next 1.5 seconds after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.

3.text: Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Ekko  dashes in the target direction, then causes his next basic attack within 3 seconds to gain  300 bonus range, have a 0.25-second cast time, make him  blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.

1.text: Phase Dive  resets Ekko's basic attack timer.

2.text: Ekko can cast any of his abilities while  dashing.

0.text: Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

1.text: Active: Ekko enters  stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards  heals himself and  dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, he generates an explosion, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

origin: 100 / 150 / 200 (+ 60% ap) (increased by 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)

scalingPartType: increased by 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds

2.text: Ekko is immune to all  displacements during Chronobreak.

1.concerningText: Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.

After traveling 700 units or upon hitting an enemy  champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds, expanding and creating a Temporal Sickness field that  slows nearby enemies, while continuing to travel in its direction for another 190 units and expanding for another 50 units.
After finishing its path, the grenade contracts and returns to Ekko at a higher speed, dealing magic damage to enemies along its path.

2.concerningText: If Ekko enters the expansion within the next 1.5 seconds after it lands, it detonates to  shield him for 2 seconds and  stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
